title: New: Advance Base – Our Cat
content:
This is the Owen Ashworth that I fell in love with all those years back.

Desperately honest, frightfully relatable and utterly unique. New track Our Cat harks back to Etiquette-years Casiotone For The Painfully Alone; a simplistic, sparse beat and a majestic piano with Ashworth’s refined vocals gliding hopelessly over the top. With Advance Base set to hit the road this November, it remains to be seen whether a full length record will surface; however until then, let Our Cat tide you over.

Our Cat (Nov 3, 2011) by Advance Base
Tour dates and information available here.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
